item.title: 隔岸观火工具网站集合[0-50]
item.description:
隔岸观火工具网站集合 我列一下我知道的 抛砖引玉
世界排名 有人均数据和第一例时间
https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus
美加数据 有累计检测数据
https://coronavirus.1point3acres.com/
美国数据 有每日检测测数据和床位数据
https://covid-19.direct
看看新闻
https://www.reddit.com/r/Coronavirus/new/
https://www.reddit.com/r/Coronavirus
有没有更多
item.content:encoded:

二狗还我五块钱:
隔岸观火回复
No, it is not true. No a single person in the world real die at this point. Because China is a fake country. Trump knew it. That's why White house does't move a bit even China performed country wide lock-down to save their citizens at February. Because the whole country was made up. All this coronavirus virus propaganda is just a no sense forged by the deep state department to test the willpower of American citizens. DON'T BUY THE LIE!
